name: AND THESE IRON LIMBS EXILED FROM HEAVEN
name_original: AND THESE IRON LIMBS EXILED FROM HEAVEN
description:
TEAM ANGELCORE presents A ROGUELIKE feat.
a cursed lesbian mecha-angel incinerating demons by flipping them off really hard

made by spiders (code, writing and aesthetics)
and krisekrise (code and gameplay idea)

  Turn based dungeon crawling with ring-based combat -- interrupted by hot visual novel action 🔥

This is the 7drl jam-version of our game "AND THESE IRON LIMBS EXILED FROM HEAVEN" (we will update this page, when our limbs have regenerated.) It is based on a codebase from a turn-based stealth game by krisekrise and Jonas Eschner. Unfortunately, we did not find time to balance the game mechanics, but it is still an interesting gameplay idea and we already improved on it in the postjam version. So check that out, if you are not here for the original 7drl experience!



Controls

- Use WASD to move
- Use Q and E to rotate the ring fields
- Drag and drop rings to equip them
- Hover over rings to preview their abilities
- F11 for fullscreen

Tutorial

Each turn a finger on your hand will activate. Equip rings to create attack patterns for that finger. Rings can have different patterns, strengths and element types and the effects of each ring on a finger are combined together to create your attack for that turn. You can see which tiles your attack will effect next turn by the square tile borders displayed.
Reach the BOYFRIEND HEAVEN teleport (it glows pink) in each level and ascend.

The element types are: COLD, HOT, SOFT and SPIKY
